modName: Nifty Compatibility Patch for CCOR and Crafting Cloud Storage
summary: Fixes crashes at the smelter and tanning rack when using both Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade and Crafting Cloud Storage and Retrieval.
descriptionHtml:
Requires both [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33963/?]Dienes' Crafting Cloud Storage and Retrieval[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49791/?]Kryptopyr's Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade[/url]
Fixes a CTD that occurs when using both mods that occurs when crafting something at the smelter or tanning rack with the skill gain turned on for those stations in CCOR's options.

Known bugs:
Returning items to storage after use option in Crafting Cloud Storage doesn't work - the items are returned before crafting. Do not select this option right now.
author: Nifty Bottle
